name: section_title
label: Section Title
default: The enterprise-grade security and privacy practices your data deserves.

name: section_content
label: Section Content
default: StarRocks' native support for distributed JOIN algorithms and its cost-based optimizer best-in-class query performance against both single and multi-table joined queries. With StarRocks, users get to keep their normalized tables and do JOIN operations on the fly, simplifying their data ingestion pipeline, improving data freshness, and cutting down on ETL costs.
